page.title: 07Farming
page.content:
FARMING
Farming in the block is evenly split between grain production, cattle, sheep, soft fruits and market gardening. Llandinabo Farm is particularly noted it's pedigree Hereford cattle. A comparatively new aspect of farming is the growth of poultry units, there beinmg four units producing in the region of 1 million birds a year, mainly turkeys. These birds are then sent to a factory in Hereford for processing. There is a goat farm nearby which breeds eight different breeds of goat. Milk and goat-related equipment is also sold.
